name.en: Signal and Big Data Processing in Brain Science with MATLAB
name.ch: MATLAB在腦科學訊號及巨量資料上的應用

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: "Build advanced ability of data analysis in Neuroscience using MATLAB From this semester, this course will be conducted as special topics. In each week one or two students should be in charge of this course. The responsible students should report a specific chapter of our textbook, as well as writing the program refered in the chapter."
goal.ch: "建立學生以matlab分析線性與非線性腦訊號及腦科學大量資料的進階能力 本課程本學期開始採取專題討論方式授課，每次指定一至二位學生報告專書特定章節，每位選課同學均須參與報告兩次以上，並負責撰寫實作該專書中所提及之程式"

content.en:
"A. Introduction to Brain connectivity
B. Brain connectivity: Cross-Frequency Coupling
C. Brain connectivity: Granger Prediction
D. Brain connectivity: Mutual Information
E. Brain connectivity: Graph Theory
F. Statistical Analyses in Brain Science 1
G. Statistical Analyses in Brain Science 2"
content.ch:
"A. Introduction to Brain connectivity
B. Brain connectivity: Cross-Frequency Coupling
C. Brain connectivity: Granger Prediction
D. Brain connectivity: Mutual Information
E. Brain connectivity: Graph Theory
F. Statistical Analyses in Brain Science 1
G. Statistical Analyses in Brain Science 2"

textbook.en: "1. Analyzing neural time series data. Mike X. Cohen 2. Hilbert-Huang Transform and Its Applications. Norden E Huang & Samuel S P Shen"
textbook.ch: "1. Analyzing neural time series data. Mike X. Cohen 2. Hilbert-Huang Transform and Its Applications. Norden E Huang & Samuel S P Shen"

flex_desc.en: The last two weeks are for practice. Students will apply the programming language acquired in the classroom to the project and submit the results as a report.
flex_desc.ch: 最後二周為專題實作，由學生自行完成將課堂上習得的程式語言應用於實際的專題上，並將成果以報告之形式繳交

domain.en: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究
domain.ch: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究

en.competency: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫

ch.Assessments: 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en: Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
Faculty:Non-College of Health Sciences and Technology only.
ch: 系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
學院:限非生醫理工學院。
